dotnetType.name: SByteResolverCase
dotnetType.summary: A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.SByte" />.

returns.summary:
A successful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.IntegerResolution" /> result if the type is <see cref="T:System.SByte" />;
            an unsuccessful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.UnsupportedTypeException" /> result otherwise.

overloads.summary: Resolves sbyte (8-bit signed integer) type information.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SByteResolverCase extends Chr.Avro.Resolution.ReflectionResolverCase
